WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not a bug. Read the documentation on Gear Optimization and Gemming Templates. You don't have any epic gems considered available.
WorkItem.Description: When I try to optimize my hunter, Rawr will either place blue quality gems in slots or regem slots previously containing epic quality gems with blue quality gems.  I am thinking this is not a correct application.  The file I am sending, you will notice the breastplate contains blue quality gems upon using the optimization feature.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Optimizer places blue quality gems rather than epic quality gems
